EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to an ASA Regulatory Update via webex!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join ASA!
Regulatory Update for Foreign Schools Webex
National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has designed a regulatory update via webex. Join us for an in-depth discussion on the anticipated changes that will result from Negotiated Rulemaking; both the General Provisions and loan issues including changes to preferred lender lists.
Dates and Time:
Thursday 10/16/2007 9:00 a.m. - 10:15 a.m. EST
Course Description: Our regulatory analysts will focus on any changes that we anticipate may impact your day-to-day job responsibilities. Note that this training will be speculative based on the draft language published to date but we want you to be prepared! Don't worry, we'll be offering lots of additional training opportunities once the final rules are out! (ACG/Smart Grants and accreditation will not be covered.)
Who Should Attend
Any financial aid administrator interested in the most up to date information related to Negotiated Rulemaking.
How You Will Benefit Know what changes to anticipate as a result of Negotiated Rulemaking. Learn what aspects of the act could affect the way you administer Title IV funds.
How to register or for additional information.
· Register Online at http://www.amsa.com/fap/training · Email: send your name, phone number and enrollment details to training@amsa.com · Phone: call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099
All American Student Assistance training events are offered free of charge.
